subject: Paranormal Underworld
author: Chad
full_text:
I can't sleep, so here I sit. Anyway, I was just listening to an old
radio show and the website Paranormal Underground came up in
discussion. I had never heard of it before, but I did a search on the
board here and I know how Frank feels about it. lol.

Just wondering if any of you have ever tried it out? Was it a total
crock or what? Just curious and bored.
